ingredients.name: cucumber, peeled, halved lengthwise, seeded and shredded

instructions:
1. Peel and remove seeds from cucumber
  2. Shred cucumer
  3. Toss with salt
  4. Let drain for 15-30 minutes
  5. Add cucumber to 3/4 cup of yogurt, 2 tbsp scallions and 1 tbsp cilantro
  6. Add salt and pepper to taste
Source: America's Test Kitchen Healthy Family Cookbook
